price: But those who fulfill their covenant and fear Allah, surely Allah loves those who fear Him.
arabic: بَلَىٰۚ مَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِعَهۡدِهِۦ وَٱتَّقَىٰ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
